headline: 3 Value Stocks with Warning Signs
summary: Value investing has created more billionaires than any other strategy, like Warren Buffett, who built his fortune by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.

content.title: 3 Value Stocks with Warning Signs
content.summary: Value investing has created more billionaires than any other strategy, like Warren Buffett, who built his fortune by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. headline: Constellation Brands (STZ): Assessing Valuation After a 38% Share Price Slide in 2024
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) has quietly slipped this year, with the stock down roughly 38% year to date despite steady revenue and double digit net income growth, creating an interesting setup for patient investors. See our latest analysis for Constellation Brands. The recent slide largely reflects a reset in risk appetite rather than a collapse in fundamentals. The share price is now at $138.08 after a steep year to date decline, but some short term momentum has returned in the past month as...

headline: Constellation Brands to Report Third Quarter 2026 Financial Results on January 7, 2026 After Market Close and Host Conference Call on January 8, 2026 at 10:30 AM ET
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE: STZ), a leading beverage alcohol company, announced today it will report financial results for its third quarter ended November 30, 2025, on Wednesday, January 7, 2026, after the close of the U.S. markets by posting the earnings release and financial tables, as well as other supporting materials, on the company’s investor relations website at ir.cbrands.com.
